name: Mato - The TeenyTiny Tech Demo
description:
Mato is an in-development competitive deathmatch game, inspired by Liero and Noita. 

This is an early-access tech demo of the engine powering Mato, where your goal is to reach the right side of the screen as fast as possible.

Mato uses C extensions to supercharge the capabilities of the DragonRuby Game Toolkit, a feature exclusive to the Pro license of DragonRuby. Games that use C extensions cannot be ported to the browser, which means you'll need to download the tech demo to test it out.
